titleStmt.title: The pityfull histori[e] of two louing Italians, Gaulfrido and Barnardo le vayne, which ariued in the countrey of Grece in the time of the noble Emperoure Vaspasian and translated out of Italian into Englishe meeter by John Drout ...
titleStmt.author: Drout, John, fl. 1570.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Binneman, dwelling in Knightrider streete, at the signe of the Mermayde,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the St. Catharine's College (University of Cambridge). Library.

place.placeName: Knightrider streete, at the signe of the Mermayde
